entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING WEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS AROUND 30

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 50
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
